channel.title: Divine-Reality | The original & Best OSRS reborn server
channel.description:
[center]Prepare to be amazed, Divine-reality has being in development for a long period of time and we are still eagerly updating the server with new content updates, fixes and improvements.
Do you enjoy a server ran by the community? Well here we are dedicated on updates being 'player chosen' We continuously accept feedback, suggestions and await your suggestions. We will go out of our way to make sure we can bring you updates that you want.
To view our website: http://divine-reality.net
[img]http://i.imgur.com/MgTvwj7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hCczz1A.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CwjBuCR.png[/img]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ur2lWkpUZT0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ur2lWkpUZT0[/url]
[SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://divine-reality.net"]Index[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://divine-reality.net/lic/"]Forums[/URL] - [URL=http://"http://divine-reality.net/DR.jar"]Play Now[/URL][/SIZE]

item.title: Divine-Reality | The original & Best OSRS reborn server
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

So many OSRS servers being made left, right & center.

As much as I love old school servers, there is just such a wide variety to choose from, and unfortunately this is not really any different from the others. Try and add more of your own unique features to make this stand out from the crowd. Goodluck with this.

Read full topic
item.source: Divine-Reality | The original & Best OSRS reborn server
